function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in implementing emergency control measures","Impact":"Increased transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Early implementation of control measures, such as school closure and patient isolation","Technologies":"Contact tracing and monitoring technologies","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Ineffective prohibition of intercity travel","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of COVID-19 to other cities","Mitigation":"Effective enforcement of travel restrictions and border controls","Technologies":"Border monitoring technologies, travel restriction enforcement technologies","People":"Travelers, residents of other cities","Owner":"Government, law enforcement agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate response to outbreak in cities","Impact":"Higher number of laboratory-confirmed cases","Mitigation":"Early implementation of control measures and public health interventions","Technologies":"Data analytics for early detection, public health communication technologies","People":"Residents of affected cities","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"}]}
